name: NoFluffJustStuff
0:
”Alexa open No Fluff Just Stuff”
”Alexa ask No Fluff Just Stuff when is the next event”
”Alexa ask No Fluff Just Stuff when is New England Software Symposium”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: no fluff just stuff
des: The No Fluff Just Stuff skill is an Alexa-based guide to the No Fluff Just Stuff Conference Tour (see https://nofluffjuststuff.com). It can answer questions about upcoming NFJS shows and those who will be presenting at those NFJS tour stops.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
